txt.en: You have earned the trust of the Lossoth Master of the Hunt!
Niko has challenged you with hunting the kalpa-kita that haunt Leijona-kotin, a wooded area east of Jänis-leiri.

'You have proven a valuable acquaintance, Sivullinen. Perhaps you would help with one last task?

Nearby, in a wooded area we call Leijona-kotin, many kalpa-kita dwell. They are vicious beasts and kill many animals and Lumi-väki alike. I want you to go there and cull their numbers. Perhaps that will forestall any further aggression from them.

'You can find Leijona-kotin to the east of here. Be sure you kill their leader, the one we call Pitkä-hammas.'
Kalpa-kita can be found at Leijona-kotin, east of Jänis-leiri.\n\nNiko wants you to cull the numbers of kalpa-kita in the area and especially to defeat a vicious cat named Pitkä-hammas.
'He... he is dead? Truly? Pitkä-hammas is dead?\n\n'You may return to Ora and tell her that her Master of the Hunt has deemed you to be a skilled hunter, [placeholder].'
Niko is at Jänis-leiri, west from Leijona-kotin.\n\nYou should return to Niko and tell him of your success.
'You can find Leijona-kotin to the east of here. Be sure you kill their leader, the one we call Pitkä-hammas.'
'Well done! Did you save a tusk for yourself?'
